front.title: IPv6 over Constrained Node Networks (6lo) Applicability & Use cases

abstract.t: This document describes the applicability of IPv6 over constrained node networks (6lo) and provides practical deployment examples. In addition to IEEE 802.15.4, various link layer technologies such as ITU-T G.9959 (Z-Wave), BLE, DECT-ULE, MS/TP, NFC, PLC (IEEE 1901.2), and IEEE 802.15.4e (6tisch) are used as examples. The document targets an audience who like to understand and evaluate running end- to-end IPv6 over the constrained node networks connecting devices to each other or to other devices on the Internet (e.g. cloud infrastructure).
